1100101100101010 0001000101110011 0 -> sum: 1101110010011101, cout: 0
1100010110101000 1110011110110011 1 -> sum: 1010110101011100, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
